summary: An apparently happy family man must reveal a lifelong secret - that he is gay.
cast: Calvin Tuteao|Nathalie Boltt|George Henare|Vicky Haughton|Dean O'Gorman|Pana Hema Taylor|Miriama-Jane Devantier|Robert van Mackelenberg|Geoffrey Snell|Patara Berryman|Inia Maxwell|Niwa Milroy|Bridget Pyc|Margaret-Mary Hollins|Jarod Rawiri|Amber Cureen|Scott Cotter|Li Ming Hu|Stephen Butterworth|Jacqueline Nairn|Charlie McDermott|Noa Campbell|Tyra Wilson|Shannon McClure|Alexander Hempstock|Jack Walley|Gary Young|Ethan Renata|Owairea Tawera
title: Nights in the Gardens of Spain
